name: The Garden Path (Demo)
description:
Fly through the cosmos in an attempt to be creative. Powered by the Datamuse API, the universe will try its best to provide you with the appropriate words to give your musing a lick of sense.

Controls
  • Left/Right - Turn
  • Up - Thrusters
  • Backspace/Delete - Restart
  • F - Toggle fullscreen
  • T - Open Twitter in your browser to share your masterpiece
  • Esc - Quit game
